pli-tv-pvr1.4:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr1.4:1.1: When it comes to the offenses for having sexual intercourse, how many of the seven classes of offenses are they found in?
pli-tv-pvr1.4:1.2: The offenses for having sexual intercourse are found in three of the seven classes of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.4:1.3: it could be the class of offenses entailing expulsion; it could be the class of serious offenses; it could be the class of offenses of wrong conduct. …
pli-tv-pvr1.4:2.1: When it comes to the offense for, out of disrespect, defecating, urinating, or spitting in water, how many of the seven classes of offenses are they found in?
pli-tv-pvr1.4:2.2: The offenses for, out of disrespect, defecating, urinating, or spitting in water are found in one of the seven classes of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.4:2.3: in the class of offence of wrong-doing.
pli-tv-pvr1.4:3.1: Concluded is the Fourth Chapter: that on Comprised In
